metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5455 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The internal feed reader APIs that crossed the sandbox barrier allowed for a sandbox escape and escalation of privilege if combined with another vulnerability that resulted in remote code execution inside the sandboxed process. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.1 and Firefox < 53.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5455` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
